infos.value: So even the exalted Machérie can't best the two of us at once.
You must tell King Robb that Xiza and Vistralle have betrayed us and joined the Sanctum.
Father was headed for Wezette. If you want those reinforcements, then make haste!
It's all the same to me. I intended for King Robb to find out, anyway. If anything, she's saving us the trouble.
Handle this one with a little more moderation, would you?
Let's take our lady here to Leonis Castle.
We don't know what's going to happen. Some would consider it a bad idea to bait the enemy to our stronghold.
We don't know what's going to happen, you say?
Very well. We'll take Machérie to Leonis Castle.
